sentence.Network_en: I like a racing bike with a gearshift.

sentence.Network_en: In Britain they call a gearshift a gear lever.
The emergency brake is located next the the gearshift.
sentence.Network_cn: 紧急制动器在变速器的旁边.

list.abs: the engine will be connected to an eight speed ZF automatic transmission which was specifically designed to provide maximum gearshift comfort and fuel efficiency .该引擎将被连接到8速ZF公司自动变速箱是专为提供最大限度的换档舒适性和燃油效率。
shift control is an important component of the automatic gearshift technique on vehicle .换档控制是汽车自动变速技术中的重要部分。

embedded software of automatic gearshift control is composed of real-time operating system ( RTOS ) μC / OS- Ⅱ , data structure , algorithm and network transmission protocol .嵌入式软件系统基于μC/OS-Ⅱ实时操作系统（RTOS)，通过数据结构、算法和通讯协议实现农业机械自动换档控制。

in order to improve temperature field distribution of ZL80 wheel loaders power gearshift box , the paper researches the wheel loaders temperature field distribution in unit time .为了改善ZL80型轮式装载机的动力换挡变速箱的温度场分布状况，对其单位时间内温度场分布进行了研究。

entry.def: In a vehicle, the gearshift is the same as the gear lever .

means.word_mean: 1. a mechanical device for engaging and disengaging gears;
